definitions.title: adv. 1.
definitions.body: where? Ge 37:16, 1Sa 19:22, 2Sa 9:4, Is 49:21, Je 3:2, Job 4:7, Job 38:4, Ru 2:19; in indirect sentence Je 36:19 (less common than [[אַיֵה]], used of persons [contrast [[אֵי־וֶה]]] and with a verb [contrast [[אַיֵּה]]]).
of what kind? (quails ?) only Ju Jdg 8:18.
